page.title: 05THE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
285 children attend {Thorpe Willoughby {Primary School.}The pupils are aged between 5 and ll. The school is used by people living in the village for such activities as evening classes and clubs.
There are 11 full-time teachers and 1 part-time teacher. There is a School Library but this is not housed in a separate room. Many fund-raising events are held to bring in money for school equipment.
Many outings are organised by the School but they no longer have visits to the Swimming Baths like they used to. Sports matches against other schools are played. There are football, cricket, netball and rounders teams.
